Uses of Package
jtxt.emulator

  • Packages that use jtxt.emulator 
    Package Description
    jtxt  
    jtxt.emulator  
    jtxt.emulator.tui  
    jtxt.emulator.util.image  
  • Classes in jtxt.emulator used by jtxt 
    Class and Description
    BufferedFrame
    Similar to a video frame, this is a frame of Glyphs that represents the entirety of characters that are available to be fetched and painted to the screen by the renderer at a specific point in time.
    Context
    Encapsulates the properties of an instance of Terminal.
    Glyph 
    GString
    A string of glyphs, with various methods to aid in the conversion of an escaped String into individual character elements and persisted in an instance of this class.
    Location
    A place where text can be inserted within the buffer.
    Region
    Defines a region within the terminal in terms of a start and end location.
  • Classes in jtxt.emulator used by jtxt.emulator 
    Class and Description
    BitmapFont
    A font which has been rasterized and saved in an appropriate image format.
    BufferedFrame
    Similar to a video frame, this is a frame of Glyphs that represents the entirety of characters that are available to be fetched and painted to the screen by the renderer at a specific point in time.
    Context
    Encapsulates the properties of an instance of Terminal.
    EventDispatcher
    Handles events which are propagated by a user, and which must be polled for over the lifetime of the program.
    Glyph 
    GlyphRasterizer 
    GString
    A string of glyphs, with various methods to aid in the conversion of an escaped String into individual character elements and persisted in an instance of this class.
    Location
    A place where text can be inserted within the buffer.
    Prompt 
    Region
    Defines a region within the terminal in terms of a start and end location.
    Renderer 
    Renderer.RasterType
    The kind of GlyphRasterizer that should be created when we construct an instance of the Renderer.
    ResizeSubject 
    ResizeSubscriber 
    Terminal
    A class for displaying TUI Components on the screen.
    Terminal.Builder
    Aids in the construction of new instance of a Terminal.
